name: dadi.tech
description: The website for DADI, built using our technology.

scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build:css' workspace/frontend/sass/ -d -u && watch 'npm run build:js' workspace/frontend/src/ -d -u
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.postbuild:css: postcss --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 1%' workspace/public/assets/css/*.css --replace --map && npm run mincss
scripts.mincss: cleancss -o workspace/public/assets/css/main.min.css workspace/public/assets/css/main.css --source-map && npm run notify:css
scripts.postbuild:js: uglifyjs workspace/public/assets/js/main.js -o workspace/public/assets/js/main.min.js && npm run notify:js

author: DADI <team@dadi.tech>
